name: itgeq1d
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wceq(citg(s0, c0, c1), citg(s0, c2, c1)))

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wceq(citg(s0, c0, c1), citg(s0, c2, c1)), wceq(c0, c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(citg(s0, c0, c1), citg(s0, c2, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c2))
-| wi(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(citg(s0, c0, c1), citg(s0, c2, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(citg(s0, c0, c1), citg(s0, c2, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c2))
-| wi(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(citg(s0, c0, c1), citg(s0, c2, c1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(citg(s0, c0, c1), citg(s0, c2, c1)))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(citg(s0, c0, c1), citg(s0, c2, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c2))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)

comment: Equality theorem for an integral. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
